timeline.message:
Implement Eureka event listener to set ribbon timeouts as system properties

Signed-off-by: at670475 <andrea.tabone@broadcom.com>

timeline.bodyText: Is it possible to either remove these values or set them to something meaningful.
timeline.author: balhar-jakub
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -78,6 +78,9 @@ apiml:
                 enableUrlEncodedCharacters: true
                 gatewayPort: 10010
                 gatewayAuthEndpoint: /api/v1/gateway/auth
+                connectTimeout: 5684
+                readTimeout: 75437

timeline.message:
Remove timeouts from DC configuration

Signed-off-by: at670475 <andrea.tabone@broadcom.com>
